title: BigW typeface
content:
Hello all. I need to know the typeface for Toy Spectacular. Vag? Gotham round? not sure.  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905084539im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/lowest-price-promo_4797.jpg)

 [‹ Captain Morgan](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905084539/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47386 "Go to previous forum topic") [I need help identifying the type on this logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905084539/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47414 "Go to next forum topic")
author: insertmoney

comments.content:
VAG Rounded (Vokswagen AG Rundschrift)  
and Helvetica Rounded comes close.

Should be VAG Rounded squoosed a bit horizontally.

BTW What is the script?
Cheers for the help! No idea what the script is, thought it might have been gino school script closed and tidied, i cant check though as i lost that font.
